mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rn, a.* from (select r.*, nickname from member m, review r where m.mno = r.mno and cno = #{cno} and r.del = 'n' order by rvno desc) a) where rn between #{startRow} and #{endRow}
select round(avg(star_rate), 1) from review where cno = #{cno} and del = 'n'
mapper.update: update review set del = 'y' where cno = #{cno} and mno = #{mno}
mapper.select: select count(*) from review where cno = #{cno} and del = 'n'
